item.title: 希腊将就国家银行股权出售聘请更多顾问
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，希腊已经安排了更多的投资银行帮助安排希腊国家银行的股份出售，因为希腊政府希望减少其在该国贷款机构中的股份。【原文：Greece has lined up more investment banks to help arrange a share sale in National Bank of Greece, according to people familiar with the matter, as the government looks to reduce its stake in the country’s lenders.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）说，人工智能主题 "煮过头了"。
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）认为，今年早些时候推动 S&P 500 指数创下历史新高的人工智能热潮正在消退，因此股市要想重拾涨势，还需要新的催化剂。【原文：The artificial intelligence boom that powered the S&P 500 Index to record highs earlier this year is fizzling out, so the stock market needs a new catalyst if the rally is going to resume, according to Morgan Stanley’s Mike Wilson.】

item.title: 孟加拉国向贷款方寻求 50 亿美元紧急资金
item.description: 临时政府领导人穆罕默德-尤努斯说，孟加拉国已向包括国际货币基金组织在内的主要贷款机构寻求 50 亿美元，以重建外汇储备。【原文：Bangladesh has sought $5 billion from major lenders, including the International Monetary Fund, to rebuild foreign exchange reserves, Muhammad Yunus, head of the interim government, said.】

item.title: Stellantis 供应商 CLN 在不景气中寻求债务谈判建议
item.description: 由于需求疲软、通货膨胀和电动汽车销售低迷对该行业造成了影响，Stellantis NV 的一家供应商计划聘请顾问帮助解决超过 4 亿欧元（4.41 亿美元）的债务问题。【原文：A supplier to Stellantis NV plans to hire advisers to help with more than €400 million ($441 million) of debt as softening demand, inflation and sluggish electric vehicle sales impact the sector.】

item.title: 惠普为 95 亿美元债务交易向投资者发出邀请
item.description: 惠普企业公司（Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co.【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. is sounding out investors on Wednesday for a potential $9.5 billion debt package to help fund its acquisition of Juniper Networks.】

item.title: 俄罗斯油价回落至七国集团规定的 60 美元价格上限以下
item.description: 俄罗斯的旗舰产品乌拉尔原油已经回落到七国集团及其盟国为惩罚莫斯科的乌克兰战争而规定的每桶 60 美元的价格上限以下。【原文：Russia’s flagship Urals crude has dropped back below the $60-a-barrel price cap imposed by the Group of Seven nations and its allies to punish Moscow for its war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 欧洲 9 月债务高峰创纪录地达到 1,000 亿欧元
item.description: 由于借款人利用较低的收益率和相对平静的市场，在美国总统投票前大举举债，欧洲 9 月份的债券销售额将创纪录地突破 1,000 亿欧元（1,100 亿美元）大关。【原文：Europe is set to pass the €100 billion ($110 billion) mark for September bond sales in record time as borrowers take advantage of lower yields and comparatively calm markets to load up on debt before the US presidential vote.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行与花旗银行和 Erste 银行一样认为福林将进一步走软
item.description: 从巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）到花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：The forint is poised to extend its status as the underperformer among eastern Europe’s currencies, according to a growing chorus of strategists from Barclays Plc to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 安杜兰认为英国碳价有可能上涨 50
item.description: 全球商品的最佳交易之一可能是英国的碳市场。【原文：One of the best trades in global commodities could be in the UK’s carbon market.】

item.title: 台新在与 CTBC 的收购战中提高新光报价
item.description: 台湾台新金融控股公司（Taishin Financial Holding Co.【原文：Taiwan’s Taishin Financial Holding Co. has raised its offer for Shin Kong Financial Holding Co. in a move to fend off a competing bid from rival suitor CTBC Financial Holding Co. as the takeover battle for the island’s bank continues.】

item.title: CPI数据公布后，交易员放弃对美联储本月大幅降息的押注
item.description: 在上个月美国消费者通胀核心数据略微升温之后，交易员们巩固了美联储下周仅降息四分之一点的可能性。【原文：Traders cemented odds the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates by only a quarter-point next week after US consumer inflation arrived a little hotter on the core reading for last month.】

item.title: 南非银行关注无担保贷款以吸收损失资金
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）表示，南非最大的银行必须在明年开始发行数十亿兰特的新的可吸收损失类债务，这些银行将通过把无担保债务纳入拟议的工具来部分实现这一目标。【原文：South Africa’s biggest banks, who must start issuing billions of rand next year for a new loss-absorbing class of debt, will partly get there by rolling unsecured liabilities into the proposed instrument, Moody’s Ratings said.】

item.title: 美国核心通胀率回升，抑制美联储大规模降息的可能性
item.description: 由于住房成本加速上涨，8 月份美国基本通胀率意外回升，这削弱了美联储下周大幅降息的可能性。【原文：Underlying US inflation unexpectedly picked up in August as housing costs accelerated, undercutting the chances of an outsize Federal Reserve interest-rate cut next week.】

item.title: 投资者寻找稳定的科技赢家，IBM 接近历史新高
item.description: 历史上最早的大型科技公司之一正在悄然复兴，其股价即将创下十多年来的首个纪录。【原文：One of history’s original big tech firms has been having a quiet renaissance that’s left its shares on the cusp of their first record in more than a decade.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体股在辩论后下滑，锁定期即将结束
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司股价在周三早盘与总统选举对手卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）的辩论后暴跌。【原文：Shares of Donald Trump’s social-media company tumbled in early trading Wednesday morning following his debate against his presidential election opponent Kamala Harris.】

item.title: 矿商淡水河谷上调铁矿石年产量预测
item.description: 淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）表示，该公司的铁矿石产量将超过之前的预期，尽管由于中国钢铁业放缓对全球市场造成压力，铁矿石价格接近近两年来的最低点。【原文：Vale SA said it will produce more iron ore than previously expected, even as prices are trading near their lowest in almost two years as China’s steel slowdown weighs on the global market.】

item.title: 美国大辩论后，特朗普交易进一步缩水
item.description: 由于市场观察人士认为昨晚的辩论改善了卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）获胜的前景，交易员们正在进一步平仓与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得白宫有关的押注。【原文：Traders are further unwinding bets linked to Donald Trump winning the White House as market watchers saw last night’s debate as improving the prospects of a victory by Kamala Harris.】

item.title: 英国天气比去年圣诞节更冷，电力需求激增
item.description: 由于欧洲各地寒流来袭，伦敦的气温降至去年圣诞节的水平以下，英国的电力需求正攀升至几个月来的最高水平。【原文：UK power demand is climbing to the highest level in months as a cold snap across Europe sees temperatures in London dip below those of last Christmas.】

item.title: 新加坡使用稳定币支付的金额增至近 10 亿美元
item.description: Chainalysis 的一份报告显示，第二季度新加坡使用稳定币支付的金额达到近 10 亿美元，创下历史新高，其中商铺交易额居首。【原文：Payments in Singapore using stablecoins reached a record high of almost $1 billion in the second quarter, led by transactions at merchant outlets, according to a report from Chainalysis.】

item.title: 软银支持的风险投资基金称将避开信贷金融科技公司
item.description: 由软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）支持的圣保罗风险投资公司 Upload Ventures 正在加大对人工智能公司的投资，同时避免向信贷金融科技公司和其他它认为风险过高的公司注资。【原文：Upload Ventures, a Sao Paulo-based venture capital firm backed by SoftBank Group Corp., is boosting its investments in companies that use artificial intelligence while avoiding capital injections in credit fintechs and others it considers too risky.】

item.title: 蒙古首座耗资 17 亿美元的炼油厂将于 2026 年 3 月完工
item.description: 印度工程师有限公司（Engineers India Ltd.）董事长周三表示，该公司预计将于 2026 年 3 月完成蒙古首座 150 万吨炼油厂的建设。【原文：Engineers India Ltd. is expected to complete the construction of Mongolia’s first 1.5 million ton oil refinery by March 2026, the company’s chairman said Wednesday.】

item.title: 反对 Intrum 重组计划的债权人将联合起来
item.description: 反对瑞典收债公司 Intrum AB 重组计划的两组债权人通过与同一财务顾问合作，向更紧密的合作迈出了一步。【原文：Two groups of creditors opposed to Swedish debt collector Intrum AB’s restructuring plan have taken a step toward closer collaboration by working with the same financial adviser.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克总统敦促内阁采取行动避免欧盟援助制裁
item.description: 斯洛伐克总统彼得-佩莱格里尼（Peter Pellegrini）敦促斯洛伐克政府采取必要的措施，避免可能受到欧盟的金融制裁。【原文：Slovak President Peter Pellegrini urged the government to take steps needed to avoid potential financial sanctions from the European Union.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利预计德国将掀起 IPO 浪潮和大型并购交易
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）称，由于投资者在经历了交易荒之后热衷于购买，未来两年德国可能会出现一波首次公开募股热潮。【原文：Germany could see a wave of initial public offerings in Germany over the next two years as investors are keen to buy after a drought of transactions, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 对石油交易商而言，供应过剩比需求更令人担忧
item.description:
在本周的新加坡会议上，全球对原油的需求似乎正在减弱，但迫在眉睫的新一轮原油生产浪潮引发了更大的担忧。【原文：

The world’s appetite for crude looks to be flagging, but a looming wave of new production poses a greater concern at this week’s Singapore conference.

】

item.title: 花旗称石油暴跌预示欧佩克+无需额外供应
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）表示，石油价格跌至两年多来的最低水平表明，市场认为没有必要增加欧佩克+的供应。【原文：Oil’s collapse to the lowest level in more than two years is the market’s indication that there’s no need for extra OPEC+ supplies, Citigroup Inc. said.】

item.title: 高盛将出售与 30 亿美元杠杆贷款相关的 SRT
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is selling a significant risk transfer tied to a portfolio of about $3 billion of leveraged loans, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 土耳其核电站在德国延误后寻求中国零件
item.description: 土耳其能源部长表示，由于德国西门子能源股份公司（Siemens Energy AG）的运输延误可能导致项目脱轨，俄罗斯国有企业俄罗斯原子能公司（Rosatom Corp.【原文：Russia’s state-owned Rosatom Corp. has placed an alternative equipment order from China for Turkey’s first nuclear power plant, as shipping delays from Germany’s Siemens Energy AG threaten to derail the project, Turkish energy minister said.】

item.title: 交易商权衡巴西出口和天气因素，阿拉比卡咖啡下跌
item.description: 阿拉比卡咖啡从一个多星期以来的最高点回落，因为交易商权衡了巴西强劲的出口和对巴西干燥的担忧。【原文：Arabica coffee dipped from the highest in more than a week, as traders weighed strong exports from Brazil and concerns about dryness there.】

item.title: 欧洲面临科技难题：监管还是创新
item.description: 欧洲领导人要想在科技领域赶上世界其他国家，可能需要放弃他们屡试不爽的方法。但首先...【原文：Europe’s leaders may need to drop their tried-and-true methods if they are to catch up to the rest of the world in tech. But first...】
